rows.name: Professional Experience
cells:
0-2 years’ experience in content strategy.

Minimal knowledge of CMS platform capabilities
2-4 years’ experience in content strategy. Growing knowledge of CMS platform capabilities
4-6 years’ experience in content strategy. Proven ability to provide oversight and creative direction on large content initiatives

rows.name: UX&D Process Knowledge and Documentation
cells: Expected to have working knowledge of experience design processes. Able to comprehend project, creative, user research and content requirements; able to conduct content inventories, audits and general content analysis
Expected to be able to follow and understand a defined experience design process. Able to creative strategy documentation, content type definition and content mapping documentation

Expected to be able to follow, understand and enhance a defined experience design process. Able to comprehend, interpret and contribute to project, creative, user research and content requirements; able to conduct research, create strategy documentation and training materials

rows.name: Business Domain Knowledge
cells: Capable of working within multiple customer verticals
Has experience working within multiple customer verticals

rows.name: Reliability and Independence
cells: Can provide minimal communications and editorial advice/direction. Follows standards, systems and best practices for content creation, distribution, maintenance, content retrieval and content re-purposing. Expected to work effectively under supervision
Growing ability to provide oversight and creative direction on large content initiatives. Expected to work effectively under supervision
Expected to create content without direct supervision

rows.name: Quality
cells: Must show a sense of responsibility for the quality of the deliverables created by him/her
Must show a sense of responsibility for the quality of the deliverables created by him/her

rows.name: Client Relations
cells: Not expected to deal directly with customers
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; visit customers with supervision
Expected to participate in phone conferences; be interviewed by customers; visit customers with supervision
